algorithm_technique: Iterate through students' start and end times, checking if queryTime falls within their interval.
problem_summary_simple: Count students doing homework at a specific time.
problem_summary_technical: Iterate through start and end times, checking if queryTime is within [startTime[i], endTime[i]] for each student.
key_insights: The problem is a direct check of intervals.
No complex data structures are needed; a simple loop suffices.
Constraints are small, so a linear scan is efficient.
